<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t NumFreeBlocks = FreeBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a568ff706b8c5991bd299c8c00b803897">count</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumFreeBlocks &lt; NumBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!IsGrowable)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">make&#95;error&lt;MSFError&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#a6dd094d4d36a053567100db04e6f873fa30d5ef9a8eb9e9530b28192db6bd88b0">msf&#95;error&#95;code::insufficient&#95;buffer</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;There are no free Blocks in the file&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t AllocBlocks = NumBlocks - NumFreeBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t OldBlockCount = FreeBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#abf86e1383aec181a5a2d9967eb8070fd">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t NewBlockCount = AllocBlocks + OldBlockCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t NextFpmBlock = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(OldBlockCount, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>) + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    FreeBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a32859a24aa7a3be269855b989d92a4b4">resize</a>(NewBlockCount, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we crossed over an fpm page, we actually need to allocate 2 extra</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks for each FPM group crossed and mark both blocks from the group as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// used.  FPM blocks are marked as allocated regardless of whether or not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// they ultimately describe the status of blocks in the file.  This means</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that not only are extraneous blocks at the end of the main FPM marked as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allocated, but also blocks from the alternate FPM are always marked as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allocated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NextFpmBlock &lt; NewBlockCount) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewBlockCount += 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">      FreeBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a32859a24aa7a3be269855b989d92a4b4">resize</a>(NewBlockCount, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">      FreeBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a168122d6ac4ed2a8b722e01b592ad289">reset</a>(NextFpmBlock, NextFpmBlock + 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">      NextFpmBlock += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t NextBlock = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint32&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add a new stream mapped to the specified blocks.  Verify that the specified</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks are both necessary and sufficient for holding the requested number</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of bytes, and verify that all requested blocks are free.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t ReqBlocks = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#abe111677aa4b3df2bb68f54d4351a72d">bytesToBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, BlockSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ReqBlocks != Blocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">make&#95;error&lt;MSFError&gt;</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#a6dd094d4d36a053567100db04e6f873fa8e40c21d17487b141e798359ee241411">msf&#95;error&#95;code::invalid&#95;format</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">      FreeBlocks.resize(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> + 1, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mark all the blocks occupied by the new stream as not free.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> : Blocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#acf419bcec077ae6a195e0dcb3f14e255"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#af4a2024c4c2cee5d75b2146a5bc544d4">MSFBuilder::addStream</a>(uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t ReqBlocks = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#abe111677aa4b3df2bb68f54d4351a72d">bytesToBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, BlockSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt; NewBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t OldSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#a83b60b1263dc7b45aa324789cea86b2e">getStreamSize</a>(Idx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OldSize == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t NewBlocks = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#abe111677aa4b3df2bb68f54d4351a72d">bytesToBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, BlockSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t OldBlocks = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#abe111677aa4b3df2bb68f54d4351a72d">bytesToBlocks</a>(OldSize, BlockSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewBlocks &gt; OldBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t AddedBlocks = NewBlocks - OldBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we&#39;re growing, we have to allocate new Blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt; AddedBlockList;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC = allocateBlocks(AddedBlocks, AddedBlockList))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;CurrentBlocks = StreamData&#91;Idx&#93;.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a39d3d23a084c4544ee5903203db10e8a">llvm::append&#95;range</a>(CurrentBlocks, AddedBlockList);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OldBlocks &gt; NewBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For shrinking, free all the Blocks in the Block map, update the stream</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// data, then shrink the directory.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t RemovedBlocks = OldBlocks - NewBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurrentBlocks = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(StreamData&#91;Idx&#93;.second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RemovedBlockList = CurrentBlocks.drop&#95;front(NewBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> : RemovedBlockList)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">      FreeBlocks&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">    StreamData&#91;Idx&#93;.second = CurrentBlocks.drop&#95;back(RemovedBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BlockSize) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 8192:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#a6dd094d4d36a053567100db04e6f873fabbd9a1474b25700e3efa35ba7242b07a">msf&#95;error&#95;code::size&#95;overflow&#95;8192</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 32768:</Highlight></CodeLine>
